info.name: MIDAZ
info.description:
This is a swagger documentation for the Midaz Ledger API

**IMPORTANT**: This collection requires the **MIDAZ Environment** to be selected for proper functionality. Please ensure you have imported and selected the MIDAZ environment before using this collection.

item.name: Complete API Workflow
item.description: A sequence of API calls representing a typical workflow, generated from WORKFLOW.md.
